7802.quoteText:
Class Action Waiver:

The parties agree that the arbitrator may not consolidate more than one personâ€™s claims, and may not otherwise preside over any form of a class or representative proceeding or claims (such as a class action, representative action, consolidated action or private attorney general action) unless both you and Loot Crate specifically agree to do so following initiation of the arbitration.
